# Problem 1

##Creating a dataframe
```{r, echo=FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
data_frame = tibble(
  x = rnorm(10),
  vec_logical = x > 0,
  vec_char = 1:10,
  vec_factor = factor(x = character(10), 3)
)
```

##Finding the Means

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
mean(pull, x)

pull(x)
mean(x)
mean(vec_logical)
mean(vec_char)
mean(vec_factor)
```
